name: Check status
description: Show unstaged and staged changes before committing

name: Stage all changes
description: Add every modified and new file to the next commit

name: Commit with message
description: Create a commit with a concise summary message

name: Push to GitHub
description: Send the current branch to origin (replace main if different)

name: Start dev server
description: Launch Vite dev server with hot reload

name: Fetch NFCU rates
description: Scrape Navy Federal's auto loan rates and upsert into Supabase

name: Fetch NFCU rates (dry run)
description: Preview rows without writing to Supabase

name: Import FL Gov fees
description: Load Florida government fee JSON and push to Supabase

name: Import FL Gov fees (with backup)
description: Back up existing fees before importing new ones
